page_content:
Product Quality  
& Safety 
Our growing menu of diagnostic tests 
leverages advances in molecular science and 
machine learning technology to improve care 
for patients, enabling them to avoid risky, 
costly procedures and interventions, and 
accelerate time to appropriate treatment. 
We collect extensive clinical utility data to 
demonstrate our tests’ ability to provide 
trustworthy and actionable answers 
throughout the patient journey. As a part of 
this process, we have implemented rigorous 
quality control processes to validate the safety 
of our diagnostic tests. Our diagnostic tests enable 
patients to avoid risky, costly 
procedures and interventions, 
and accelerate time to 
appropriate treatment.
27
